alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 10:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...VICTORIA AND EAST CENTRAL GOLIAD COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT... At 1037 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Salem to near Telferner to near Saxet Lakes. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Point Comfort, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Nursery, Long Mott, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Green Lake, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Downtown Victoria, Alamo Beach, Schroeder, and Dacosta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 622 and 650. US Highway 77 between mile markers 564 and 600. US Highway 87 between mile markers 800 and 840. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Victoria
